text: Heng Mok Zung (王睦錝; born 1978), commonly known as Zung, is a photographer from Malaysia. He has taken photos of Prime Minister of Malaysia Mahathir Mohamad and was the photographer at the wedding of Zara Salim Davidson and Raja Nazrin Shah, the Sultan of Perak. He is also the personal photographer for Tony Robbins. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Malaysian artists Category:Photographers
title: Zung
